text:
Airbus A³ | Avionics Engineers (Electrical and Real-time Software) | Onsite Full-time in San Jose, CA | http://airbus-sv.com/

A³ is the Silicon Valley outpost of Airbus Group SE, the parent company of Airbus. As an embedded software or electrical engineer, you will be responsible for the design, development, test and support of safety-critical electronic systems. Prior experience developing products with certification objectives or functional safety requirements, is a plus. Please see job posts for more information regarding open positions and application process.
